title: Episode 424 - I'm A People Person!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway are joined by Range 15 and Office Space star Richard Riehle as he discusses his career, what it's like to star in 300+ movies, and how many times he's been cast as Santa.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway are joined by Range 15 and Office Space star Richard Riehle as he discusses his career, what it's like to star in 300+ movies, and how many times he's been cast as Santa.
